  • Classes in goal.core.program.rules used by goal.core.program 
    Class and Description
    RuleSet
    Container for the rules in the program{} section.
  • Classes in goal.core.program.rules used by goal.core.program.actions 
    Class and Description
    Rule
    A rule consists of a condition (body) and an action (head).
  • Classes in goal.core.program.rules used by goal.core.program.dependencygraph

    A rule consists of a condition (body) and an action (head).

    Class and Description
    Rule
    A rule consists of a condition (body) and an action (head).
  • Classes in goal.core.program.rules used by goal.core.program.rules 
    Class and Description
    ForallDoRule
    A rule of the form:
        forall CONDITION do RESULT.

    Where CONDITION is a MentalStateCond, and RESULT an ActionCombo.
    IfThenRule
    A rule of the form:
        if CONDITION then RESULT

    Where CONDITION is a MentalStateCond, and RESULT an ActionCombo.
    ListallDoRule
    A rule of the form:
        listall CONDITION -> VAR do RESULT.
    or:
        listall VAR <- CONDITION do RESULT.
    Rule
    A rule consists of a condition (body) and an action (head).
    RuleSet
    Container for the rules in the program{} section.
    RuleSet.RuleEvaluationOrder
    The different orders in which the rules of an RuleSet can be evaluated.
  • Classes in goal.core.program.rules used by goal.core.program.validation.agentfile 
    Class and Description
    Rule
    A rule consists of a condition (body) and an action (head).
    RuleSet
    Container for the rules in the program{} section.
